meaning_str.bing:
v. 依靠；信任
网络. 依赖；信赖；倚赖

信赖；依赖；依靠；信任；指望；依仗；寄托希望于

1.en: He was one of the nation's foremost civil rights leaders, and he was a person on whom his friends could always rely.
1.cn: 他是全国民权运动最重要的领袖之一，还是一个在朋友们看来值得依赖的人。

2.en: His advice to GPs was "not to rely on Tamiflu as a treatment to reduce complications" or to think of it as a "magic bullet" .
2.cn: 他建议医师“不要依赖达菲，将其作为减少并发症的治疗药物”或认为它是“万能药丸”。

3.en: Don't rely on an air conditioner, ventilation system or an open window to clear the air.
3.cn: 不要依赖空调，排气系统或打开窗户来清洁空气。

0.en: Around the country, kids rely on a half-million-member army of transportation experts, the nation's school bus drivers.
0.cn: 整个国家的孩子都依靠这50万公交专家，这些学校的巴士司机。

1.en: Raymond's not a politician. He relies on our political expertise as much as we rely on his business acumen.
1.cn: Raymond不是政客。他依赖我们的政治意见，正如我们依靠他的商业头脑。

2.en: I had to support myself. I couldn't rely on Mr. Robertson's promise to see me through.
2.cn: 我必须自寻出路，不能光指望罗伯森的承诺帮我度过难关。

3.en: Our school buses work amazingly well, which is good considering how much we rely on them.
3.cn: 我们的校车非常好，这也考虑到了我们对它们的依赖程度。

4.en: So I'm delusional and hormonal. And I can't trust my delusional thoughts. I have to rely on the labs.
4.cn: 我现在爱幻想，又冲动，但是我 又不能任凭主观臆断，我得依赖检验结果。

5.en: To keep the power on, we rely on what's been called the largest and most complex machine in the world.
5.cn: 要保持供电，我们依赖一种大而复杂的机器。

6.en: To keep it from crashing down again, we rely on a hidden army whose soldiers put their lives on the line every single day.
6.cn: 为防止电网再次瘫痪，我们启用了神秘部队，他们每天都与电线为伴。

7.en: So, we rely therefore on your complete discretion. Good. Anyway, gentlemen, madam, allow me to be the first to wish you, bon voyage.
7.cn: 所以你们最好深思熟虑，很好！至少各位让我先祝福你们一路顺风。

8.en: There was no time for calculating. I had to rely on my experience of managing the altitude and speed of thousands of flights over four decades.
8.cn: 根本没有时间去计算，我不得不依赖自己这四十多年来，从上千次飞行中积累下来的对高度和速度的掌控经验。

9.en: But you can't just rely on a lucky monkey. There are some pretty serious rules you have to follow if you don't want to completely mess up the year ahead.
9.cn: 要想好运来，仅靠幸运猴子可不够，有些正经规矩必须得好好遵守，否则，新的一年就会被你搞得乱七八糟。
